member.name: P:TencentCloud.Postgres.V20170312.Models.CreateInstancesRequest.KMSKeyId
member.summary: KeyId of custom key, which is required if you select custom key encryption. It is also the unique CMK identifier.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Postgres.V20170312.Models.CreateInstancesRequest.KMSRegion
member.summary: The region where the KMS service is enabled. When `KMSRegion` is left empty, the KMS of the current region will be enabled by default. If the current region is not supported, you need to select another region supported by KMS.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Postgres.V20170312.Models.CreateInstancesRequest.DBEngine
member.summary: Database engine. Valid values: 1. `postgresql` (TencentDB for PostgreSQL) 2. `mssql_compatible`MSSQL compatible-TencentDB for PostgreSQL) Default value: `postgresql`

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Postgres.V20170312.Models.CreateInstancesRequest.DBEngineConfig
member.summary:
Configuration information of database engine in the following format: {"$key1":"$value1", "$key2":"$value2"}
Valid values: 1. mssql_compatible engine `migrationMode`: Database mode. Valid values: `single-db` (single-database mode), `multi-db` (multi-database mode).
